reviews.review_content: Dafna is a great TA.  In section, she put everything in very understandable terms & even cited exact page numbers for the most important information in each reading.  Extremely helpful for both the midterm & the final.  If Dafna is your TA, go to section!

Supremely helpful TA with a very strong command of the material discussed in class. Dafna lays it all out in clear and understanding terms. Definitely go to section and be sure to attend the review session before the final exam. It was very helpful and informative, and saved many a person's ass for the final, lemme tell you.
